participant_1.name: David
participant_1.personality: Friendly and engaging, enjoys discussions about movies and books.
participant_1.background: Horror movies are my favorites. I am a stay at home dad. My father used to work for home depot. I spent a decade working in the human services field. I have a son who is in junior high school.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and creative, loves storytelling and exploring new ideas through reading.
participant_2.background: I read twenty books a year. I am a stunt double as my second job. I only eat kosher. I was raised in a single parent household.

content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1, what's your name?
Hi! I'm participant_2. It's nice to meet you.
It's nice to meet you too! What do you do for a living?
I'm a stunt double.
Wow! That's a cool job! What's your favorite movie that you've been in?
I don't really have a favorite movie, but I've had a lot of fun doing stunts for movies like The Avengers, The Dark Knight, and the Fast and Furious franchise.
Those are all great movies! I love the Avengers!
Me too! It was so much fun working on that movie.
What's it like being a stunt double?
It's a lot of work, but it's also a lot of fun. I love getting to be a part of making movies and TV shows.
That's awesome! I bet it's really exciting.
It is! I never know what's going to happen next.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to read. I read about 20 books a year.
Wow! That's a lot of books. What are some of your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but I especially love science fiction and fantasy.
Me too! I love those genres. What are some of your favorite science fiction books?
I love the Ender's Game series and the Dune series.
Those are both great series! I've read them both too.
I also love the Harry Potter series and the Lord of the Rings series.
Those are all great books! I love them too.
